sqlMap.select:
SELECT SUM(t.trade_price) FROM dms_tb_trade t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.STATE = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId#
t.type IN #codes[]#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dms_tb_trade t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.STATE = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId#
t.type IN #codes[]#

SELECT COUNT(1) AS amount, SUM(t.trade_price) AS tradePrice, t.shop_id AS shopId FROM dms_tb_trade t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.STATE = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId#
t.type IN #codes[]#
GROUP BY t.shop_id

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.shop_id AS shopId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.sup_id AS supId, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.change, t.type FROM dms_tb_trade t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId# AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
t.type IN #codes[]#
ORDER BY TRADE_ID DESC

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.shop_id AS shopId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.sup_id AS supId, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.change, t.type, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate FROM dms_tb_trade t, dms_tb_org_shop p WHERE t.shop_id = p.shop_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.org_id = #orgId# AND t.shop_id = #shopId# AND t.trade_no = #tradeNo#
